Metadata.Title: ASP.NET Process Account Is Configured for Least Privilege
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that ASP.NET process account is configured for least privilege if your application does not use the default ASPNET account, which is a least-privileged account.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
